title: EPISTOLA Priscilla R. Feigen
html:
EPISTOLA Priscilla R. Feigen

A few additions to Joann Karges' “Rhyme and Jingle”: hotchpotch, titbit (source of tidbit), and rumdum.

[Priscilla R. Feigen, Palo Alto, California]
